All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bot
Bot player
CentralSector
The central sector of the map containing TriPrime
Colors
Enumeration storing all the available colors for players
Command
An action performable by players
Debugger
Class used only for debugging purposes, with display methods
DefensiveBot
Bot player with a defensive strategy
Expand
Command card belonging to a player that enables him to perform Expand
Explore
Command card belonging to a player that enables him to perform Explore
Exterminate
Command card belonging to a player that enables him to perform Exterminate
Game
The model in the VCM design pattern, performing all the game logic
GameController
Controller in the VCM design pattern
Hexagon
A hexagon constituting the map
HSystem
A system positioned on a hexagon
Human
Human player that will play through the interface
Interface
 
MenuView
 
NormalSector
Sector on the top/bottom row of the map
OffensiveBot
Bot player with an offensive strategy
Player
A player in the game
PlayerNamesView
 
PlayerSetupView
 
Possibilities
Singleton class used to generate all the possible moves for multiple actions
RandomBot
Bot player with a random strategy
Sector
Sector card constituting the game map
Ship
A spatial ship belonging to a player and navigating on the map
SideSector
The sector on the side of the middle row, next to TriPrime
